benefits.benefit1.description.value: Built on open internet protocols, there is no platform that can ban or censor you. You are in control of your data & speech.

benefits.benefit2.description.value: Creating an account doesn't require a phone number, email or name. Get started right away, and truly own your account — Thanks to advanced cryptography

benefits.benefit3.description.value: Traditional social media keeps you addicted in order to sell you ads, which is intoxicating society. Damus doesn't. The result? A healthier community.

benefits.benefit4.description.value: Tip your friends, earn tips, support creators, and stack sats with Bitcoin & Lightning, the Free and open internet money.

benefits.description.value: Damus is built on Nostr, a decentralized and open social network protocol. Without ads, toxic algorithms, or censorship, Damus gives you access to the social network that a truly Free and healthy society needs — and deserves.

benefits.subheadline.value: With Damus, you are in control.

contribute.subheadline.value: Be part of the most popular Nostr client, start collaborating with an amazing team of developers, designers, product owners and more. Join us in our mission to make social media more healthy and free!

damus_around_the_world.subheadline.value: Damus store is available, be the cool one within your group of friends, share to the world your love for Damus. You might even appear here.

final_cta.subheadline.value:
Damus is available on iOS, iPadOS and macOS (M1/M2).
It's free and open source.

home.hero.subheadline.value:
Your very own social network for your friends or business.
 Available Now on iOS, iPad and macOS (M1/M2)

home.meta_description.value: Damus is a new social network that you control. Available now on iOS, iPad and macOS (M1/M2)
